column4: Hey guys so im running ubuntu 10.04 and for some reason the volume control on the top menu bar/panel is gone. i dont know how to add it back. i click on "add to panel", but then i dont see where the volume control item is. any ideas? thanks
press alt+f2, type: gnome-volume-control-applet   press enter
packages are ready made bnaries, compiling source will allow you to use your own options and you can make a package from your compiled binaries
any lightweight linux window managers like windows-style?
